timeline.bodyText: This should have a newline after the === and I'd also mention the fixes that @kastiglione merged yesterday

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,10 @@
 Version history
 ---------------
 
+0.2.1-alpha1 (Jan 6, 2020)
+==========================
+This release contains a ref update for upstream Envoy. No changes to the feature set.

replies.bodyText: Wasn't that just a build fix?

replies.bodyText: yes but I think it's probably worth noting since it could cause problems

            Pre-releases are published on a weekly basis. The versioning scheme we use is ``X.Y.Z.{ddmmyy}``.
